Question
========

`tryCatch()` defines [[1]] handlers, whereas `withCallingHandlers()` defines [[2]] handlers.

Which ordered pair of words replaces [[1]] and [[2]] to best complete the sentence?

Answerlist
----------

* exiting, calling
* calling, exiting
* exiting, printing
* calling, printing
* printing, exiting

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Correct.
* No, it's the other way.
* No, there are no "printing" handlers.
* No, there are no "printing" handlers.
* No, there are no "printing" handlers.
